resources.string:
BattStatt does not act as an application but as a widget.

You can access BattStatt by either doing a long press on your home screen, selecting Widget and add the BattStatt widget of your choice, or on your home screen press the Menu button > Add and then selecting Widget and selecting the BattStatt widget of your choice.

Please note that the Motorola Droid/Milestone apparently only reports its battery percentage in 10 intervals, so you might experience that BattStatt isn't as precise as you wish.
